attributes.action: £50 On the spot fines for car drivers driving with Front fogs/driving lights on when its not Foggy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am so fed up of being dazzled by drivers not turning off their front driving lights. I suggest a £50 On the spot fines for car drivers driving with Front fogs/driving lights on when its not Foggy.
